memberdef.name: ComputeGlobalKnotInsertionMatrix

briefdescription.para: Compute the Global knot insertion matrix for all parametric dimensions at once.

detaileddescription.para: Currently we return a list of length (para_dim) containing a tuple of numpy arrays, that can be used to instantiate scipy sparse matrices. This helps avoid binding eigen as a separate library.

parameterdescription.para: list of arrays, representing the individual knot vectors of the start spline

memberdef.name: FindConnectivityFromCenters

briefdescription.para: Determine the connectivity from center-vertices, assuming nothing of the underlying grid.

detaileddescription.para: Duplicate Points are not eliminated, assuming that a maximum of two points are equivalent. If this is not the case an exception is thrown. In theory this has complexity O(nlogn) whereas a KDTree has complexity O(n (logn)^dim).

parameterdescription.para: dimension of the object (e.g. surface in 3D)
check_orientation to check if neighboring elements match structured grid
vertices in the centers of spline-surfaces
used for preordering the vertices along a line
tolerance (distance between two vertices that are joined)

memberdef.argsstring: (const py::array_t< double > &py_center_vertices, const double &tolerance, const int &parametric_dimension)

memberdef.name: GetInterfaceOrientation

briefdescription.para: Orientation between two adjacent splines.

detaileddescription.para: If two splines share the same boundary this function retrieves their orientation, by mapping the mappings of the parametric axis onto each other. This is (among others) required for Gismo and Nutils export

parameterdescription.para: Spline object from end///to which is mapped
